import{WorkoutsContext}from"../context/WorkoutContext";import{useContext}from"react";export var useWorkoutsContext=function useWorkoutsContext(){//Every time we want to use our workouts data we just invoke this useworkoutcontext hook and get that context value back
var context=useContext(WorkoutsContext);if(!context){throw Error("useWorkoutsContext must be used inside an WorkoutsContextProvider");}return context;};
